DOC.brief_title: Intensity-Modulated Radiation Therapy ( IMRT ) Treatment Non-Anaplastic Non-Medullary Thyroid Cancer
DOC.criteria: Pathologically confirm diagnosis nonanaplastic nonmedullary thyroid cancer either grossly recurrent surgery unresectable without metastatic disease .
